body: I know that if you kill someone on Nebula, it says that you got 3 xp and that stuff. But I was playing Nexus and it didn't say anything like that. It doesn't even have the bar at the bottom. I also want to know why when I type /stats on Nexus, it doesn't do anything and says its an invalid command. Can someone help me on this? Thank You.
body_tagged: I know that if you kill someone on Nebula, it says that you got 3 xp and that stuff. But I was playing Nexus and it didn't say anything like that. It doesn't even have the bar at the bottom. I also want to know why when I type /stats on Nexus, it doesn't do anything and says its an invalid command. Can someone help me on this? Thank You.
title: XP Not Showing?

replies.body: It tells you in every gamemode when you get XP, Nexus included. The /stats will be added back soon.
replies.body_tagged: It tells you in every gamemode when you get XP, Nexus included. The /stats will be added back soon.

replies.body:
oh and this is kind of off topic but....
why cant I use the /w of /where command? or is that going to be added soon?
